channel.title: Need help playing rsps's on windows 7
channel.description: hi guys i need help playing any runescapeprivate server on windows 7, you see when i log into the client/game i can click around for like 5 minutres and then if i click any where including the minimap, so someone please help me...

item.title: Need help playing rsps's on windows 7
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Its not windows 7, its the 64-bit OS, for some reason, RSPS clients freeze with 64-bit Java, the best solution to that is 32-bit Java.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help playing rsps's on windows 7

item.title: Need help playing rsps's on windows 7
item.dc:creator: @Joeli Joeli
item.description:
@Joeli wrote:

Iknow this error, i’ve got it too,
HOW TO FIX:
Click on Edit Run.bat/cmd,
then you will see something like this:

@echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
You have to delete Javaw (only this word, dont delete any space) then repace it with this: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\#Your JDK Version#\bin\java.exe" Add the " too...

Read full topic
item.source: Need help playing rsps's on windows 7
